statements.insert:
select SEQ_SM_DVR_INFO.nextval as IntId from dual
insert into SM_Dvr_Info ( I_IntId,
C_DvrFactory, C_DvrSpec, C_DvrModel, C_DVRIP1, C_DVRIP2, I_DvrChannelNub, I_DvrStorage, C_DvrUserName, C_DvrPassword, C_DvrPort, C_CREATETIME, C_CREATEUSER ) values ( #IntId#,
#DvrFactory#, #DvrSpec#, #DvrModel#, #DvrIP1#, #DvrIP2#, #ChannelNub#, #Storage#, #Username#, #Password#, #Port#, to_char(sysdate,'yyyyMMddhh24miss'), #createUser# )
statements.update:
update SM_Dvr_Info set C_DvrFactory = #DvrFactory#, C_DvrSpec = #DvrSpec#, C_DvrModel=#DvrModel#, C_DVRIP1=#DvrIP1#, C_DVRIP2=#DvrIP2#, I_DvrChannelNub=#ChannelNub#, C_DvrUserName=#Username#, C_DvrPassword=#Password#, C_DvrPort=#Port#, I_DvrStorage=#Storage#, C_UpdateTime=to_char(sysdate,'yyyyMMddhh24miss')
where I_IntId = #IntId#
statements.select:
select a.I_IntId,
a.C_DvrFactory, a.C_DvrSpec, a.C_DvrModel, a.C_DVRIP1, a.C_DVRIP2, a.I_DvrChannelNub, a.I_DvrStorage, a.C_DvrUserName, a.C_DvrPassword, a.C_DvrPort, a.C_CREATEUSER, to_char(to_date(a.C_CREATETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') as C_CREATETIME, a.C_UPDATEUSER, to_char(to_date(a.C_UPDATETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') as C_UPDATETIME from SM_Dvr_Info a
order by a.C_CREATETIME desc

select a.I_IntId,
a.C_DvrFactory, a.C_DvrSpec, a.C_DvrModel, a.C_DVRIP1, a.C_DVRIP2, a.I_DvrChannelNub, a.I_DvrStorage, a.C_DvrUserName, a.C_DvrPassword, a.C_DvrPort, a.C_CREATEUSER, a.C_CREATEUSER, to_char(to_date(a.C_CREATETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') as C_CREATETIME, a.C_UPDATEUSER, to_char(to_date(a.C_UPDATETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') as C_UPDATETIME from SM_Dvr_Info a where a.C_DvrFactory=#value# order by a.C_CREATETIME desc

select a.I_IntId, a.C_DvrFactory, a.C_DvrSpec, a.C_DvrModel, a.C_DVRIP1, a.C_DVRIP2, a.I_DvrChannelNub, a.I_DvrStorage, a.C_DvrUserName, a.C_DvrPassword, a.C_DvrPort, a.C_CREATEUSER, a.C_CREATEUSER, to_char(to_date(a.C_CREATETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') as C_CREATETIME, a.C_UPDATEUSER, to_char(to_date(a.C_UPDATETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') as C_UPDATETIME from SM_Dvr_Info a where a.C_DVRIP1=#DvrIP1# order by a.C_CREATETIME desc

select a.I_IntId, a.C_DvrFactory, a.C_DvrSpec, a.C_DvrModel, a.C_DVRIP1, a.C_DVRIP2, a.I_DvrChannelNub, a.I_DvrStorage, a.C_DvrUserName, a.C_DvrPassword, a.C_DvrPort from SM_Dvr_Info a where a.I_IntId in (select i_dvrintid from sm_poundservice_info where i_poundid=#value#)
